title: Worlds Missions issue
body: I haven't received the second week of missions yet, from what I've seen and heard they should be out, if this is not the case I would like to know when they should be out. I've checked the worlds mission page time and time against, and though I have a starting date and an end date, I have yet to see dates for the weeks in specific. This would help clarify mine and from the look of some boards a good handful of other's questions and problems.

replies.body: No worries bud! The second set of Worlds Missions will be dropping Oct 2!

Thank you for the reply, though I would like to know if there is a set schedule somewhere I can check when I have my worries about this matter again. If not I'll wait patiently hoping for the best, though it would be nice to know when to expect these things since my schedule tends to go all over the place often.
Yea it kinda sucks we don't have a hard schedule posted with any of these dates now that you mention it. Maybe I can poke someone to get this put together

Add me  :  Whitewalker69       (EUW)
to complete the 5 premade mission!
Does Kayle class as a Melee for the new 5v5 mission? or is she classed as ranged?

So, is this normal for this week then for those who bought the Worlds Pass?

https://i.imgur.com/U8QCAKO.png

All missions completed but only showing 3/4
Yup! We'll be getting more missions on Oct 2, so we'll finally be able to finish that one up at that point!

Is the comment by Alaron Mercer true (see post below)? If so will there be a correction for the players that missed out on the 2 mission count? I am currently at 0/6 and I would find it strange if I miss out on worlds tokens due to a bug, especially since I bought the mission ticket.

> Completing missions counts before getting the next "Complete X/X mission" so if you completed multiple missions before the X/X mission kicked in, they didnt count. I believe the max possible atm is 2/6 where I am at 1/6 because i didnt get a mission counted so i was at 3/4 when i should have been 4/4
it's still weird tho, if he bought the world pass he should be 1/6 on the next mission, not 3/4 on that one {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
depends when you bought the pass and if you compelted the poro quest. did your pass cost 1300 ? or less ?
buy it the first day, now I'm at 2/6 with the pick'em mission completed
but why.. i have only this but 2/4 ?? can someone help me ? i have got the mission with who will win and i am only in 2/4.
if i buy the world pass ticket do i get the last week missions aswell?
no , but the world pass will cost less after each week

Completing missions counts before getting the next "Complete X/X mission" so if you completed multiple missions before the X/X mission kicked in, they didnt count. I believe the max possible atm is 2/6 where I am at 1/6 because i didnt get a mission counted so i was at 3/4 when i should have been 4/4
